name: Deep Dark Defence
description:
Devs:

Nick MC

Dorjderem

Mr.Cog (AKA Ma Yuanche)

Peter

Toshi

Deep Dark Defence is an exciting tower defense game with an intense and immersive storyline. The game follows a deep and mysterious story arc, taking players through a variety of levels set in eerie and dangerous dungeons. Players must strategically place their defensive towers and upgrade them with powerful spells and abilities in order to repel and defeat the onslaught of monsters. With a variety of enemies and obstacles to overcome, Deep Dark Defence is a challenging and rewarding tower defense game that will test players’ skills and strategies. also mac build is sus windows build is preferred
